hero.title: Modern Independent Houses for Rent in Sector 88 Gurugram
description: Sector 88 Gurugram is a fast-developing residential locality located close to Dwarka Expressway and Northern Peripheral Road, making it an attractive option for tenants seeking modern infrastructure and smooth connectivity. People looking for a house for rent in Sector 88 Gurugram choose this area for its proximity to NH-48, IMT Manesar, IGI Airport, and major corporate hubs. The locality is surrounded by wide roads, green zones, reputed schools, healthcare facilities, and everyday convenience stores.

Independent houses in Sector 88 offer spacious layouts, better privacy, and a peaceful living environment compared to high-rise apartments. The area is well-planned with upcoming commercial developments and strong civic infrastructure, making it ideal for long-term rental living. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 88 Gurugram ensures a comfortable lifestyle with excellent connectivity, growing social infrastructure, and a balanced urban environment.

faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 88 is a developing residential area with excellent connectivity and modern infrastructure.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 88?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are available for rent.

faqs.answer: Yes, the locality offers a peaceful environment with nearby schools, hospitals, and markets.
